description: Non material amendment to approved application DM2021/01361 which allowed the 'Demolition of existing buildings and erection of a three storey building comprising commercial space (Retail) at ground floor and 7 self-contained residential units above, together with associated access, car parking and cycle storage' to allow the erection of a pergola to second floor north west (rear) elevation, replacement of large glazing panels with juliet balcony doors to the second floor north-west (rear) elevation and replacement of aluminium framed windows and doors (other than ground floor shop front windows and doors) with UPVC frames.
